NAME: Other Traits
DESCRIPTION: A specialised ability not covered by any other heading

NAME: Skills
DESCRIPTION: Learned through training, apprenticeships or other instruction

NAME: Knowledges
DESCRIPTION: The application of the mind rather than the body

NAME: Hobby Talents
DESCRIPTION: Mainly self-taught and usually more active than intellectual

NAME: Professional Skills
DESCRIPTION: Mainly taught and primarily active in application

NAME: Expert Knowledges
DESCRIPTION: Anything primarily intellectual or mental in nature and must be studied
